title: Woman, 33, reveals how she was able to travel the world by investing in Bitcoin
text:
An Australian woman has revealed she was able to travel the world by investing in cryptocurrency.

Jaide Barclay, originally from Newcastle and now living on the Gold Coast, visited 10 countries on a 12 week trip, living only on digital currency.

Ms Barclay invested in Bitcoin just before the 2017 bull run in which its value climbed to over $10,000 but then the market crashed later that year.

The 33-year-old said she still kept an eye on the price and earlier this year decided to get more involved in the blockchain industry - the technology that is the foundation for these currencies.

Jaide Barclay, originally from Newcastle and now living on the Gold Coast, visited 10 countries on a 12 week trip, living only on the digital currency

'I used Instagram to start connecting with other crypto enthusiasts and got invited to London Blockchain Week, which was six days away. I jumped on a plane and went,' she told the Sydney Morning Herald.

From London she then decided to continue attending crypto conferences to learn and meet people - and she would do it by only using the digital currency.

She began in Australia and her trip took her to to Hong Kong, China, South Korea, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, America and the Bahamas.

'I Googled places that accepted cryptocurrency in the different places I was visiting... These were either physical shops or websites that I could pay for things with crypto.'

'It was a great way to travel. I actually don't think I could have completed the journey solo. Friends bailed me out on a few occasions and I was able to repay them with crypto. It wasn't the original plan, but I had to adapt along the way to get by.'

Ms Barclay said towards the end of her trip the value of Bitcoin began to climb which resulted in some wild after-parties at the conferences.

Her favourite destinations were New York due to the absence of a language barrier and the enthusiasm around blockchain.

Also scuba diving on the Great Barrier Reef was another highlight because she says it is such a wonderful experience Australia has to offer that can be done by paying with cryptocurrency.
description: An Australian woman has revealed she was able to travel the world by investing in cryptocurrency.
authors: Brett Lackey For Daily Mail Australia
